title: Spaghetti with Clams, Mushrooms and Artichokes

ingredients.content: ½ oz fresh parsley, leaves only, cleaned and dried (approx. 25 sprigs)
3 fresh baby artichokes, cut into quarters, outer spikes removed
24 oz small littleneck clams (soaked in 21 oz water with 1 tsp salt for 20-30 minutes)

preparations.content: Place fresh parsley into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place water and salt into mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket and add prepared fresh artichokes. Place Varoma into position and line with parchment paper that has been rinsed and squeezed to moisten. Place clams into Varoma, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>25 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set aside steamed clams in a large serving bowl and keep warm. Remove simmering basket with aid of spatula. Reserve steamed artichokes in the bowl with reserved clams and keep warm. Reserve 3.5 oz of cooking liquid from mixing bowl and discard the rest.
Place garlic cloves and extra virgin olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add fresh mushrooms and sauté <b>3 min/250°F//speed <b>.
Add reserved cooking liquid (3.5 oz), 1 tsp salt and reserved chopped parsley and cook <b>8 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.
Meanwhile cook spaghetti in salted (1 tsp salt) water on the stove as per package instructions. Drain spaghetti through simmering basket and transfer into the bowl with clams and artichokes.
Add cooked mushrooms and parsley from the mixing bowl into the serving bowl with spaghetti, clams and artichokes and gently combine. Serve immediately.
